meanings.definition: Hospitalists: Physicians who specialize in the care of hospitalized patients.
meanings.sent1: The hospitalists worked tirelessly to ensure the well-being of their patients.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the dedication of hospitalists in taking care of those in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hospitalists always carry stethoscopes? To listen to the heartbeat of the hospital building!
meanings.sent4: The hospitalists were like guardian angels, watching over the patients with care and expertise.
meanings.sent5: The hospitalists' commitment to their patients was unwavering and inspiring.

meanings.definition: Hospitalists: The medical specialty focused on providing comprehensive care to patients in a hospital setting.
meanings.sent1: In the field of hospitalists, patient well-being is the top priority.
meanings.sent2: The hospitalists' expertise in hospital care is invaluable for patient recovery.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hospitalists bring a map to work? To navigate through the maze of hospital corridors!
meanings.sent4: The hospitalists' knowledge and skills were a beacon of hope in the hospital environment.
meanings.sent5: The hospitalists' role in patient care was crucial for a smooth hospital experience.
